jobTitle: Associate Veterinarian at Park East Animal Hospital
jobDescription: Park East Animal Hospital, a 24/7 small animal hospital located on the Upper East Side, is looking for a full-time Associate Veterinarian to join our team. An AAHA accredited hospital, we take pride in adhering to the highest standards of medicine and providing quality care to our patients and their owners. Candidates must have completed an internship or have at least 3-5 years experience in private practice, and have strong communication skills.  Our staff includes six full-time doctors and one part-time doctor, and a support group of twenty-two technicians and client service specialists. The veterinarians are collaborative in their approach to providing the best medical care possible and are encouraged to continue to learn new skills and grow as doctors. We are fully equipped with state-of-art AUS, endoscopy, surgical laser, a full surgical suite, a full separate dental suite, digital dental X-ray and a digital X-ray machine. The schedule includes 4 weekdays and some weekends. Some evening shifts are required, as is being on call 1-2 nights per week.  We offer generous benefit packages and salary options available, including medical/vision/dental, life insurance, PTO, uniforms, 401K, continuing education, licensing fees and dues. For additional information about our hospital, please visit: http://www.parkeastanimalhospital.com/
